timeline.message:
Merge pull request #1 from futurewei-cloud/master

Replace Redis with Apache Ignite for in memory cache and db (#129)
Rename directory name from Common-service to lib
Update common jar and use latest package path in vpcmanager
update vpc manager jar package name
Reformat some files in vpc manager
route manager codes and update vpc manager
Add get/create apis on route manager and post call from vpc to route
Update gitignore to exclude logs file
Remove lib jar and add dependency on pom
Remove lib jar and add dependency on pom for route manager
update alcor route manager service and package name
Merge branch 'feature/route_manager' of https://github.com/kevin-zhonghao/alcor into feature/route_manager
Move routemanager under services and rename it to route_manager
Add web route schema and update vpc schema
Delete unused yaml files for vpcmanager

timeline.bodyText: Looks like there is an extra empty line :)?
timeline.author: er1cthe0ne

timeline.bodyText: we will need the copy right header for each source file.
timeline.author: er1cthe0ne

timeline.bodyText: I am curious, what is the benefit of catching the ParameterNullOrEmptyException and just rethrow it after?
timeline.author: er1cthe0ne

replies.bodyText: See the comments there. We would need to catch that and throw different Neutron-compatible error codes for clients. See #130
replies.author: xieus

timeline.bodyText: this /* ... */ comment style is different from other places. Maybe we want to keep it consistent by using '//' only?
timeline.author: er1cthe0ne
